name: How to use MongoRepository
shortDescription: This tutorial explains how to use the MongoRepository interface provided by Spring Data MongoDB.
content: Ok, do you know Spring Data MongoDB is a fantastic Framework ? I will demonstrate you how to use it...

name: How to write DerivedQueries
shortDescription: This tutorial explains how to write derived queries
content: Spring Data MongoDB has a lot of embedded features, they avoid us to implement classic operation like save or find. But sometimes we need specific query. How to do that? ...
